author: Peter Nicholas
title: VA Secretary’s Chief of Staff Departs After Watchdog Report
text:
WASHINGTON—Veterans Affairs Secretary David Shulkin’s chief of staff stepped down after the agency’s watchdog alleged she altered an email and misled ethics officials while arranging for Dr. Shulkin’s wife to travel with him to Europe on an official trip.
The VA said Friday that the chief of staff, Vivieca Wright Simpson, “has elected to retire” and the department has opened an investigation into her actions.
